Posts.Content: Here is an article that might help some of you and likely lead you to other articles should you choose to search. http://m.theglobeandmail.com/technology/science/one-breath-a
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: I have a question for everyone that has posted on this site. I have had foul breath for several years now. I am wondering though....can't I just go and see my dr. and have him run blood tests to see if my counts come back abnormal which would tell me whether or not I might have cancer. Or does that sometimes not work??
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: Hi Carroll, Gosh, hard to know what to do. I guess maybe as far as the coffee shop thing goes, you could end up being the one to save her life, but then what if you're wrong. I'd say better safe than sorry. Perhaps the best way would be to write a quick note and hand it to her. Telling her, in a shorter version, what you said here about your ability to smell certain cancers and that though you, of course, cannot be sure, you think it wise for her to at least be checked over. ??
Posts.Title: Cancer smell
